{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Gemtek |model=WMTC-159N |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/18/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=display receiver |fcc_id=MXF-9901100078 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CNW8625L |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR-BC |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63BFR-H9C |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0,HDMI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} "WMTC-159N_V01/B" and "ESK-P06-1602R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This device uses a '''Cavium''' PureVu SoC. It also has a smaller Macronix serial flash. The Atheros Wi-Fi chip used is white.
[http://www.wi-fisandbox.org/pdf_certificate.php?cid=WFA15620 Wi-Fi Certified] (Motorola Mobility, Wifi Display Receiver) :Probably known as the WIFIDISPLAY5901VW / WIFIDISPLAY5901
